io.scanbot.sdk.persistence

Class DocumentStoreStrategy

  • io.scanbot.sdk.persistence.DocumentStoreStrategy

  • public class DocumentStoreStrategy

    Provides java.io.File directories for saving class Document

    The structure of the document folder is the following: {documents_directory}/document UUID -------{document_name}.pdf -------{thumbnail}

    See Also:
    java.io.File, class Document

    • Constructor Detail

      • DocumentStoreStrategy

        public DocumentStoreStrategy(android.content.Context context,
                             android.content.SharedPreferences preferences)

      • migrateDocuments

        public void migrateDocuments(java.lang.String newPath,
                             java.util.List<io.scanbot.sdk.entity.Document> documents)

        Migrates all pdf files to directory specified in preferences PreferencesConstants#EXTERNAL_DIR or default directory Constants#DEFAULT_EXTERNAL_DIR_NAME or from external directory to internal application document directories.

        Use from BG thread only.

        Parameters:
        newPath - new directory path. If null then files will be moved to internal application document directories
        documents - list of document which will be moved
